Â© Copyright 2019
Photographer & Creative Director based in LA
Lauren was raised in Florida and fled to Portland, OR to pursue photography after completing her BFA in 2011. NYC was next, where she continued working as a freelance photographer & graphic designer. Turns out New York has some really cold winters, so it was onward to Los Angeles. Her photographic foundation is rooted with moody undertones and otherworldly terrains. Using creative set design and cinematic motifs, Lauren forges a dream landscape for her subject matter. She is a visual creator with a strong base on human emotion and expressive storytelling.
Let's talk.
